description:
As Bulma, Krillin, and Gohan close in on the last of the Dragon Balls, they uncover a shocking secret about their Namekian friends. Meanwhile, Goku works to build up his strength, and Vegeta sets his sights on revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Reunimos as Esferas do Dragão! Já podemos reviver Piccolo
Sorotta zo Dragon Ball! Piccolo-san mo Ikikaeru
รวบรวมดราก้อนบอลครอบ! คุณพิคโกโร่จะฟื้นแล้ว
そろったぞ神龍玉[ドラゴンボール]! ピッコロさんも生き返る
